title: Bills hire Bobby April III as their outside linebackers coach

sources.name: Yahoo Sports NFL
sources.title: Bills hire Bobby April III as their outside linebackers coach
sources.description: The Bills are hiring Bobby April III as their new outside linebackers coach, Ian Rapoport of NFL Media reports.
